headline: West Pharmaceutical initiated with a Peer Perform at Wolfe Research
summary: Wolfe Research analyst Doug Schenkel initiated coverage of West Pharmaceutical (WST) with a Peer Perform rating and no price target West Pharm is “perhaps the best-in-class” drug packaging and delivery company in the world, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm says that while management is highly regarded and has an extensive track record of strong operating discipline.
